snippet.description: At the recent WCSJ, and particularly after winning this prize, loads of lovely people came up to me and said that they read and enjoyed this blog.Which always comes as a surprise, because by and la...

snippet.title: On the Origin of Science Writers – Phenomena
snippet.description: Every now and then, I get an email from someone who’s keen to get into science writing and wants to know how I started. Whenever I reply, and I always try to, I’m always left with the nagging feeli...

snippet.title: The return of the “Who are you?” thread – Phenomena
snippet.description: Around two years ago, I started a thread asking readers to identify themselves, say something about their background, and tell me a bit about why they were reading this blog. That thread was resurr...
